title: Wifi
text:
Permanent link to this comic: http://xkcd.com/1785/ Image URL (for hotlinking/embedding): http://imgs.xkcd.com/comics/wifi.png RSS Feed - Atom Feed Comics I enjoy: Three Word Phrase , SMBC , Dinosaur Comics , Oglaf (nsfw), A Softer World , Buttersafe , Perry Bible Fellowship , Questionable Content , Buttercup Festival , Homestuck , Junior Scientist Power Hour xkcd.com is best viewed with Netscape Navigator 4.0 or below on a Pentium 3Â±1 emulated in Javascript on an Apple IIGS at a screen resolution of 1024x1. Please enable your ad blockers, disable high-heat drying, and remove your device from Airplane Mode and set it to Boat Mode. For security reasons, please leave caps lock on while browsing.
